thread.title: Four children and man rushed to hospital after fire breaks out at home
thread.title_full: Four children and man rushed to hospital after fire breaks out at home

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Four children and man rushed to hospital after fire breaks out at home

organizations.name: greater manchester fire and rescue service

text:
Four children and a man have been taken to hospital after a fire at a house.
Firefighters were called to the blaze in Withington, Manchester, at about 2.20am on Friday.
A spokesman for Greater Manchester Fire and Rescue Service said one man and four children, aged between 10 and 17, were taken to hospital.
Four fire engines were called to the scene in Parsonage Road, along with police and ambulances.
The cause of the blaze is due to be investigated jointly with Greater Manchester Police.
